```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(glmnet)
library(caret)
library(MASS)
library(car)

BEI_Data <- read_csv("BEI_Data.csv")
```


## Full Model 
```{r}
full_model <- lm(
  cancer_mortality ~ cancer_incidence + 
    obese + 
    drinking + 
    smoking + 
    educational_attainment + 
    poverty + 
    uninsured + 
    food_index, 
  data = BEI_Data
)
summary(full_model)
```

### Diagnostic plots + VIF 

```{r}
plot(full_model, which = c(1,2))

pdf("Graphs/residuals/fullmodel_rf.pdf")
plot(full_model, which = c(1))
dev.off()

pdf("Graphs/residuals/fullmodel_qq.pdf")
plot(full_model, which = c(2))
dev.off()


vif(full_model)
mean_vif <- sum(vif(full_model))/length(vif(full_model)) 
mean_vif
```

## Box Cox Investigation 

```{r}
bc <- boxcox(
  object = full_model, 
  lambda = seq(-1,1.5,0.1)
)
lambda <- bc$x[which(bc$y == max(bc$y))]
lambda
```



```{r}
#dependent variable 
Y <- (data.matrix(BEI_Data[ ,4]))

#scaled independent variables 
X <- scale(data.matrix(BEI_Data[ ,c(3,5:7,9:11)])) 
```

## Ridge Regression 
```{r}
ridge <- glmnet(
  X, 
  Y, 
  alpha = 0
)

plot(ridge, xvar = "lambda")

ridge.cv <- cv.glmnet(
  X, 
  Y, 
  alpha = 0
)

plot(ridge.cv)

ridge.cv$lambda.min

ridge_model <- glmnet(
  X, 
  Y, 
  alpha = 0, 
  lambda = ridge.cv$lambda.min
)
coef(ridge_model)
```


## LASSO Regression 
```{r}
set.seed(14)
#create lasso model with selected lambda 
lasso <- glmnet(
  X, 
  Y, 
  alpha = 1
)

plot(lasso, xvar = "lambda")


lasso.cv <- cv.glmnet(
  X, 
  Y, 
  alpha = 1
)

plot(lasso.cv)

lasso.cv$lambda.min

lasso_model <- glmnet(
  X, 
  Y, 
  alpha = 1, 
  lambda = lasso.cv$lambda.min
)
coef(lasso_model)
```

## Elastic net model 


```{r}
fold_id <- sample(1:10, size = length(Y), replace = TRUE)

tuning_grid <- tibble::tibble(
  alpha      = seq(0, 1, by = .1),
  mse_min    = NA,
  mse_1se    = NA,
  lambda_min = NA,
  lambda_1se = NA
)

for(i in seq_along(tuning_grid$alpha)) {
  
  # fit CV model for each alpha value
  fit <- cv.glmnet(X, Y, alpha = tuning_grid$alpha[i], foldid = fold_id)
  
  # extract MSE and lambda values
  tuning_grid$mse_min[i]    <- fit$cvm[fit$lambda == fit$lambda.min]
  tuning_grid$mse_1se[i]    <- fit$cvm[fit$lambda == fit$lambda.1se]
  tuning_grid$lambda_min[i] <- fit$lambda.min
  tuning_grid$lambda_1se[i] <- fit$lambda.1se
}

tuning_grid
```
